result.execSummary:
GERALD L PAMASKA was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means GERALD L PAMASKA was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. GERALD L PAMASKA

records.addlTxt: Order signed by defendant and Judge
Waiver of criminal extradition form:  Pursuant to section 976.03 Wisconsin Statutes

01:38 PM Defendant GERALD L PAMASKA in court, in custody.  Laura Nelson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Foor is here today but does not represent the defendant.  This is an intial appearance on an extradition hearing .  Defendant is wanted in the State of Kansas.  Defendant is waiving his extradition hearing.  Judge questions the defendant .  Defendant signs the extradition paperwork in front of Judge.  Judge also signs the paperwork.
